sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
The island queens, or, The death of Mary, Queen of Scotland a tragedy : publish'd only in defence of the author and the play, against some mistaken censures, occasion'd by its being prohibited the stage / by Jo. Banks. Banks, John, d. 1706.
[6], 70 p.
Printed for R. Bentley ..., London : 1684.
Imperfect? Epilogue by Joseph Haines, wanting? Cf. Genest, p. 423; DNB; Dobell's "Literature of the restoration" gives 8 prelim. pages. Produced in 1704 under title: The Albion queens. Reproduction of original in British Library.
=======
The island queens, or, The death of Mary, Queen of Scotland a tragedy : publish'd only in defence of the author and the play, against some mistaken censures, occasion'd by its being prohibited the stage / by Jo. Banks. Banks, John, d. 1706.
[6], 70 p.
Printed for R. Bentley ..., London : 1684.
Imperfect? Epilogue by Joseph Haines, wanting? Cf. Genest, p. 423; DNB; Dobell's "Literature of the restoration" gives 8 prelim. pages. Produced in 1704 under title: The Albion queens. Reproduction of original in British Library.
R. Bentley
